system.description: A concussion grenade releases a tight blast of damaging force. On successful throw, the target creature and 1 other random creature in the zone takes 3d6 damage. On a failure, both targets are random. A creature that gets a success on a Strength challenge roll takes half the damage.
system.enrichedDescription: A concussion grenade releases a tight blast of damaging force. On successful throw, the target creature and one other random creature in the zone takes [[/roll 3d6]] damage. On a failure, both targets are random. A creature that gets a success on a Strength challenge roll takes half the damage.
